name: Burger Memory Game
description:
A new way to train your brain with memory games. This time the challenge is to remember a picture list and not their position. First, you memorize all the images of fast food and then you match the cards in your kitchen. A fun game to help improve the concentration of children and adults.

The game is easy at first, but the difficulty increases with time as the customer will order more meals in your restaurant. The ingredients are chosen randomly, so you will get a new list for each new game even if you choose to play constantly at the same level.

So what are you waiting for to exercise your memory and develop your attention?

Features:
Test if you have a good memory
Cute kawaii characters for kids and seniors
Perfect for all ages, the level can be adjusted to your skill
No time limit, so no pressure
The game could help you get to the grocery store without a list
